overview.business_description: French shipping company, third-largest container shipping company globally with ~13% market share. Also one of the largest 3PL providers. Family-owned by the Saadé family.
overview.fatal_flaw: Highly cyclical shipping industry; family ownership limits governance; large fleet orderbook increases capex
overview.recent_news: Upgraded to Ba1 by Moody's (stable outlook). Strong earnings from Red Sea disruptions. Continued logistics M&A activity.

credit_opinion.summary: CMA CGM has maintained credit discipline despite strong cash flows, reinvesting in fleet and logistics acquisitions rather than paying large dividends. Ba1 rating reflects scale and low leverage.
key_risks: Container shipping rate normalization post-Red Sea
key_catalysts: Potential for investment grade if leverage stays low
credit_opinion.recommendation: NEUTRAL - Strong fundamentals but shipping cycle risk
